nl.inl.blacklab.resultproperty

Class HitPropertyContextBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.resultproperty.HitProperty
      • nl.inl.blacklab.resultproperty.HitPropertyContextBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparator<Hit>, ResultProperty<Hit>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HitPropertyHitText, HitPropertyLeftContext, HitPropertyRightContext, HitPropertyWordLeft, HitPropertyWordRight

    public abstract class HitPropertyContextBase
extends HitProperty
    Base class for HitPropertyHitText, LeftContext, RightContext, WordLeft and WordRight.
    See Also:
